pages.title: Campfire
pages.text: Use bottles of water on a $(l)lit$() campfire to get purified water bottles after some boil time.

pages.title: Furnace
pages.text: Smelt a whole bucket of water into a purified water bucket. After that use it on a copper cauldron.
$(br)Can only be placed on top of a campfire

pages.title: Campfire Cauldron
pages.text: Use a copper cauldron over a lit campfire & fill it with water from bottles, buckets or flasks.

pages.title: Copper Cauldron
pages.text: Use a copper cauldron to gather rain water over time or use buckets on it.

pages.title: Bamboo Pump
pages.text: Use bottles or buckets on it.$(br2)The pump has a cooldown after each use.$(br2)This method doesnt cost you dirty water.
